languages.text: {n}От улыбки Джай веет грустью и даже немного жалостью.{/n} "Все мы носим личины, {name}. Без них большинство лишь жалкие, уродливые, сморщенные..." {n}Джай смакует слова на языке, подбирая их ревностней {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} к ужину.{/n} "Персики? Все любят смотреть на персики, пока они свежие, сочные да упругие. А как превращаются в сухофрукт — все, пора отправляться в бочку. Так и с людьми".

traits.locale_text: {n}От улыбки Джай веет грустью и даже немного жалостью.{/n} "Все мы носим личины, {name}. Без них большинство лишь жалике, уродливые, сморщенные..." {n}Джай смакует слова на языке, подбирая их ревностней {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} к ужину.{/n} "Персики? Все любят смотреть на персики, пока они свежие, сочные да упругие. А как превращаются в сухофрукт — все, пора отправляться в бочку. Так и с людьми".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."
languages.original_text: {n}От улыбки Джай веет грустью и даже немного жалостью.{/n} "Все мы носим личины, {name}. Без них большинство лишь жалкие, уродливые, сморщенные..." {n}Джай смакует слова на языке, подбирая их ревностней {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} к ужину.{/n} "Персики? Все любят смотреть на персики, пока они свежие, сочные да упругие. А как превращаются в сухофрукт — все, пора отправляться в бочку. Так и с людьми".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, or even pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody enjoys looking at peaches when they are fresh, but once they turn into dried fruit they are good only for the sundries barrel. People are no different."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊的笑容充满了悲伤，甚至还夹杂着一丝怜悯。{/n}“我们每个人都戴着面具，{name}。若是失去了面具，绝大部分人都会变得丑陋、可怜、老态龙钟……”{n}婕伊品味着这句话，仿佛在品尝晚宴上的{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}一样。{/n}“比如说桃子？每个人都喜欢桃子新鲜时的样子，可一旦它们干瘪下去，就只能被丢进垃圾桶里。人也不例外。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的笑容充满了悲伤，甚至还夹杂着一丝怜悯。{/n}“我们每个人都戴着面具，{name}。若是失去了面具，绝大部分人都会变得丑陋、可怜、老态龙钟……”{n}婕伊品味着这句话，仿佛在品尝晚宴上的{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}一样。{/n}“比如说桃子？每个人都喜欢桃子新鲜时的样子，可一旦它们干瘪下去，就只能被丢进垃圾桶里。人也不例外。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, . Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of amasec at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa de Jae está cargada de tristeza, e incluso un toque de lástima.{/n} «Todos llevamos disfraces, {name}. Sin ellos, casi todo el mundo es feo, patético, arrugado...». {n}Jae saborea las palabras, como si fueran distintas variedades de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} en una cena elegante.{/n} «¿Los melocotones? A todos nos gustan cuando están frescos, pero, cuando se secan, solo valen para el barril de las rebajas. La gente es igual».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

Sin ellos, casi todo el mundo es feo, patético, arrugado...». {n}Jae saborea las palabras, como si fueran distintas variedades de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} en una cena elegante.{/n} «¿Los melocotones? A todos nos gustan cuando están frescos, pero, cuando se secan, solo valen para el barril de las rebajas. La gente es igual».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの微笑みは悲しみに満ちており、憐れみの色さえ帯びていた。{/n}「あたしたちは皆、仮装をしているのよ、{name}様。それがなければ、たいていの人は醜く、哀れで、しわくちゃで…」{n}ジェイはその言葉を、まるで夕食の{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}のように味わう。{/n}「桃みたいな？桃は新鮮なうちは誰だって好いてくれるわ。だけど、乾いてしまえば雑貨樽にしか入らない。人間だって同じなのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの微笑みは悲しみに満ちており、憐れみの色さえ帯びていた。{/n}「あたしたちは皆、仮装をしているのよ、{name}様。それがなければ、たいていの人は醜く、哀れで、しわくちゃで…」{n}ジェイはその言葉を、まるで夕食の{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}のように味わう。{/n}「桃みたいな？桃は新鮮なうちは誰だって好いてくれるわ。だけど、乾いてしまえば雑貨樽にしか入らない。人間だって同じなのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes Lächeln ist voller Trauer, auch ein Hauch von Mitleid ist zu spüren.{/n} "Jeder trägt eine Verkleidung, {name}. Ohne sie wären die meisten Leute hässlich, erbärmlich, faltig ..." {n}Jae lässt sich die Worte auf der Zunge zergehen, kostet sie wie die verschiedenen Sorten {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g} beim Abendessen.{/n} "Pfirsiche? Jeder mag den Anblick von Pfirsichen, wenn sie frisch sind, doch wenn sie erst einmal ausgetrocknet sind, taugen sie nur noch für das Restefass. Bei Menschen ist es nicht anders."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Lächeln ist voller Trauer, auch ein Hauch von Mitleid ist zu spüren.{/n} "Jeder trägt eine Verkleidung, {name}. Ohne sie wären die meisten Leute hässlich, erbärmlich, faltig ..." {n}Jae lässt sich die Worte auf der Zunge zergehen, kostet sie wie die verschiedenen Sorten {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g} beim Abendessen.{/n} "Pfirsiche? Jeder mag den Anblick von Pfirsichen, wenn sie frisch sind, doch wenn sie erst einmal ausgetrocknet sind, taugen sie nur noch für das Restefass. Bei Menschen ist es nicht anders."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de Jae est empreint de tristesse et même d'un soupçon de pitié.{/n} « Nous portons tous des masques, {name}. Sans eux, la plupart des gens sont laids, pathétiques, ridés... » {n}Jae savoure ses mots, les goûte comme différentes variétés d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} au dîner.{/n} « Comme les pêches. Tout le monde les trouve appétissantes quand elles sont fraîches, mais une fois qu'elles commencent à s'assécher, elles ne sont plus bonnes qu'à mettre en conserve. C'est pareil pour les gens. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de Jae est empreint de tristesse et même d'un soupçon de pitié.{/n} « Nous portons tous des masques, {name}. Sans eux, la plupart des gens sont laids, pathétiques, ridés... » {n}Jae savoure ses mots, les goûte comme différentes variétés d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} au dîner.{/n} « Comme les pêches. Tout le monde les trouve appétissantes quand elles sont fraîches, mais une fois qu'elles commencent à s'assécher, elles ne sont plus bonnes qu'à mettre en conserve. C'est pareil pour les gens. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın gülümsemesi hüzün, bir miktar da acıma barındırıyor.{/n} "Hepimiz kendimize yakışanı giyeriz {name}. Onlar olmadan çoğu insan çirkin, zavallı ve kırış kırıştır." {n}Jae, sanki akşam yemeğinde farklı {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasekler{/g} tadar gibi sözlerinin keyfini sürüyor.{/n} "Şeftali mesela? Herkes taze şeftalinin görünüşünü sever ama kuruduktan sonra atılır gider. İnsanlar da farklı değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile is full of sadness, and even a hint of pity.{/n} "We all wear guises, {name}. Without them, most people are ugly, pathetic, wrinkled..." {n}Jae savours the words, tasting them like the varieties of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} at dinner.{/n} "Peaches? Everybody likes the look of peaches when they're fresh, but once they dry out, they're only good for the sundries barrel. People are no different."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın gülümsemesi hüzün ve bir miktar da acıma barındırıyor.{/n} "Hepimiz kendimize yakışanı giyeriz {name}. Onlar olmadan çoğu insan çirkin, zavallı ve kırış kırıştır." {n}Jae sözlerinin tadını çıkarıyor. Sanki bir akşam yemeğinde farklı {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} çeşitlerinin tadına bakıyor gibi.{/n} "Şeftali mesela? Herkes taze şeftalinin görünüşünü sever ama kuruduktan sonra atılır gider. İnsanlar da farklı değildir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
